name: No Transmission
description:
Parasites know  that the best place to infect people is at underground raves.

Don't kill (hang) the DJ or the obliviously high dancing civilians.... unless you have to. 

We made this for Global Game Jam - Simply, we wanted to experiment with 3d in gamemaker.

The song Transmission is by Joy Division (and we don't own the rights) and released by Factory.
